86159.「カンダタさーん。\n <pc>が 手伝うみたいだぞー。:
Robbin' 'Ood. I think <pc> is going
to help you.

86161.「ご苦労だったな ボラオ。\n ほれ 約束のアクロバットケーキだ。:
Good job, Borao. Here, Acrobatic Cake as
promised.

86162.「やったー！ ケーキ ひとりじめだー！: Yay! I'll have the cake all to myself!

86163.「さて 俺様の最強の子分 <pc>！\n 今回の仕事だが……:
Well, my best henchman <pc>! This
job...

86164.「ん？ 子分になった覚えはない……だと？\n うるせえ！ 俺様のカンダタ団は\n:
Hmm? I'm not your henchman...? Shut up! My
Robbin' 'Ood is short on staff right now!

86165.「そもそも テメーが キラキラ大風車塔で\n 俺様の子分を やっつけたから\n:
In the first place, he got away from me
because you defeated my henchman at Glitter
Windmill Tower.

86166.「だから テメーは 責任をとって\n 今日から 俺様の子分になれ！\n 文句ねえ:
So you take responsibility and become my
henchman from today! You don't have a problem
with that, do you? Hey! Hey!<yesno><close>

86167.「うるせえ！ つべこべ言わずに\n 俺様の子分になれ！\n 文句ねえよな？ な！:
Shut up! You don't have to do anything. You
can be my henchman now! You're not
complaining, are you? Hey! Hey!<yesno><close>

86168.「へへっ。命びろいしたな <pc>！\n どうしても断るってんなら\n この場で:
Heh heh. You're a dead man, <pc>! If
I had to do it, I would have beaten you to
death right here and now!

86170.「よし！ これからも よろしくなっ！\n 最強の子分 <pc>！:
All right! Keep up the good work! The best
henchman <pc>!

86171.「さて……今回 テメーを呼び出した\n その理由を 教えてやろう。:
Now... let me tell you why I called you this
time.

86173.「あの 空に浮かんでるお月様にゃあ\n とんでもねえ秘宝が眠ってるって 伝説があ:
There is a legend that the moon floating in
the sky holds some unbelievable treasure.

86174.「というわけで テメーには\n 月へ行くために 協力してもらうぜっ！:
So, I'm going to need your help to get to the
moon!

86175.「この間は キラキラ大風車塔のプロペラで\n 塔ごと 空を飛べねえかと試してみた:
The other day I tried to see if the propeller of the Glitter Windmill Tower would allow the whole tower to fly, but that didn't seem to
work.

86176.「だが！ 俺様は 新しい方法を見つけたのよ！\n その方法は…………: But! I found a new way! And that way is...

86177.「<pc>。\n オルフェアの町の ビッグホルンへ来い！\n ……すべては それ:
<pc>. Come to the Big Horn in the
Town of Orphea! ...and then it's all over,
man!

86178.「これから <pc>のことは\n カンダタ子分って 呼んでやるぞー。\n カンダ:
I'm going to call <pc> Robbin' 'Ood's
henchman from now on. Work hard for Robbin'
'Ood.

90701.「キラキラ大風車塔や この ビッグホルンなどを\n 設計した 偉大な建築家プロッ:
He is a venerable, unemployed man, descended from the great architect Proppe, who designed the Glitter Windmill Tower and this bighorn,
among others.

90702.「コイツも 俺様の新しい子分よ！\n おい <pc>！\n 先輩として かわいが: He's my new henchman, too! Hey! Pet Monster!

90703.「は？ 私は 子分になった覚えは……: Huh? I don't remember being a henchman...

90704.「うるせえ！ 俺様が子分だと決めたんだ！\n テメーらは 死ぬまで 俺様の子分よ:
Shut up! I've decided you're my henchmen! You're my henchmen until the day you die. Listen, you two, get along well with each
other!

90705.「ううむ……少々 複雑ですが\n 仕事もなく ブラブラしているよりは\n たとえ:
Well... it's a little complicated, but it's better to have a job, even if it's as a thief's henchman, than to be hanging around
without a job.

90706.「<pc>さん 私のことは\n カンダタ子分Ｂと お呼びください。\n もちろん:
<pc> Please call me Robbin' 'Ood
henchman B. Of course you are henchman A!

90707.「さて……カンダタ親分さん。\n 私に 頼みとは いったいなんでしょう？:
Well, Mr. Robbin' 'Ood. What on earth do you
want to ask me for?

90708.「おう。そうそう ソレが本題よ。\n テメーを子分にしたのは\n ビッグホルンの:
Oh. That's right, that's the main point. I
made you my henchman so I could increase the
output of the Big Horn!

90709.「ホルンの出力を？\n ……はぁ まあ 無職であるとはいえ\n ウデきき建築士の:
Horn output? Well, it's easy for me, an
unemployed but well-practiced architect, to do
that.

90710.「それなら 話が早ぇや！\n ぱぱぱっと やってくんな！:
Well, then, you better talk fast! Don't just
walk away from me!

90711.「できました！\n 無職ながら ウデきき建築士の私が\n ホルンの出力を操作して:
It's done! I'm an unemployed, but very skilled
architect, and I manipulated the output of the
horn and doubled it!

90712.「よーし でかしたっ！\n それじゃ さっそく乗り込むとするか！: All right, we did it! Let's get out of here!

90715.「わあっ！ カンダタ親分さん！\n し しっかりしてください！！:
Whoa! Robbin' 'Ood! Please pull yourself
together!

90716.「おいっ ペリポン！！\n ちっとも 出力が上がってねえじゃねえか！\n どこが:
Hey, Peripon! You're not even getting any more
power! What kind of a skilled architect are
you?

90717.「わあっ 乱暴はよしてください！\n 助けてください カンダタ子分Ａさん！:
Oh, no! Please don't be violent! Help me,
Robbin' 'Ood, henchman A!

90718.「うるせえ！ 月の秘宝を手に入れるために\n 俺様は 月に飛んで行きてえんだ！\:
Shut up! I want to fly to the moon to get Moon
Treasure! Just get on with it and do
something!

90720.「ええ～っ！？\n あの 空に浮かぶ お月様にですか！？: What? On the moon in the sky?

90721.「……それならそうと 最初に言ってください。\n 今の ビッグホルンでは無理です:
...then be the first to say so. The current
big horn is not going to cut it. It needs to
be radically remodeled.

90723.「う～む……その ガンガン電池ってので\n この ビッグホルンの出力を\n 爆発:
Hmmm... can we use those Clanging Batteries to
blast up the output of this Big Horn?

90724.「はい。無職の私の 偉大なる先祖が作った\n キラキラ大風車塔・１０の秘密の ひ:
Yes, I am. One of the 10 secrets of the
Glitter Windmill Tower, built by my unemployed
great ancestor. It's the Clanging Battery.

90725.「あとの ９つも なかなか素晴らしい\n 驚きに満ちているんですよ！\n たとえ:
The other nine are full of wonderful
surprises! For example...

90726.「そっちの話は どうでもいい。\n で ガンガン電池は どこにあるんだ！？:
I don't care what you say. So where are the
Clanging Batteries!

90727.「親分さんが持ってきた古文書によれば……\n キラキラ大風車塔の 儀式の間。\n:
According to an ancient document brought by the master... the Ritual Hall of the Glitter Windmill Tower. It appears to be hidden in a
lamp on the wall.

90728.「よし！ <pc>！\n テメーの出番だぜ！ ガンガン電池を\n キラキラ大風車:
Alright! <pc>! You're up! Go get some
Clanging Batteries from the Glitter Windmill
Tower!

90729.「わあっ 待ってください！\n なにしろ ガンガン電池は貴重なものですから\n:
Wait a minute! Clanging Battery is so valuable
that it's locked up under lock and key!

90731.「なんだあ？ カギに心当たりがあるのか！\n なら さっさと渡すのが 身のためだ:
What the hell? You know what the key is? Then
it's in your own best interest to give it to
me right now!

90732.「……風車のカギは 無職の私の偉大な祖先\n 建築士プロッペから 受け継がれ\n:
...The Windmill Key was passed down to me by my great, unemployed ancestor, architect Proppe, and has been a treasured family
heirloom for generations.

90733.「しかし……つい先日 その風車のカギを\n ある盗賊に 盗まれてしまったんです。:
But...just the other day, the key to that
Windmill Key was stolen by some thieves.

90734.「なにぃ！？ 俺様の風車のカギを盗んだ\n けしからん盗賊が いるだと！？\n:
What? There's an outrageous thief who stole my
Windmill Key! Who is this thief?

90735.「……忘れもしない アイツです！\n 悪名高き 盗賊ラゴスこそが\n 風車のカギ:
...that is the man you will never forget! The
notorious thief Thief Lagos is the one who
stole the Windmill Key!

90736.「ふん……ラゴスか。\n なつかしい名前を 聞いたもんだぜ。\n だが アイツの:
Lagos. That's a familiar name. But I know
where he is.

90737.「ドワチャッカ大陸 ボロヌス溶岩流の東\n ……最果ての地下遺跡の奥に\n おそ:
East of the Boronus Lava Flow, Dwachakka
Continent... deep underground Ruins, perhaps
Lagos is hiding.

90740.「最果ての地下遺跡の奥に 着いたら\n そのノートに書かれた文章を 読み上げろ！:
When you reach the depths of the Deep
Underground Ruins, read aloud the sentence
written in that notebook!

90741.「<pc>！\n テメーは 俺様の最強の子分だ。\n 必ず ラゴスから 風車のカ:
<pc>! You are my strongest henchman.
You must get the Windmill Key back from Lagos!

90742.「風車のカギを 手に入れたら\n キラキラ大風車塔に 集合だぞ！！:
If you received the Windmill Key, we'll meet
at the Glitter Windmill Tower!

90744.「そっ それは 昔 僕が作った詩！？\n どうして 知ってるんだ……！:
Oh, my God, that's a poem I wrote a long time
ago! How did you know that?

90745.「僕の秘密を 知られたからには\n 生かして帰すわけに いかない。\n ……覚悟:
Now that he knows my secret, I can't let him
go home alive. Prepare yourself!

90746.「君……なかなか やるな。\n ここまで 僕を追い詰めるとは。:
You... are quite good. You've really pushed me
this far.

90747.「でも いったい どこで\n 僕が若い頃に作った\n 詩のノートを 手に入れたん:
But where on earth did you receive the
notebook of poems I wrote in my youth?

90748.<cs_pchero>は 盗賊ラゴスに\nカンダタから 漆黒のノートをもらった\:
<cs_pchero> explained to the thief Lagos how
Robbin' 'Ood had given him the Jet-Black
Notebook!

90749.「くっ……。僕の過去を\n カンダタに 知られてしまっていたなんて……。\n 恥:
I can't believe Robbin' 'Ood knows about my
past... I'm too embarrassed to steal anything!

90750.「しかし……そうか。僕が盗んだ 風車のカギを\n 取り戻すために 来たんだね。\:
But... okay. You came here to get back the
Windmill Key that I stole. But I can't just
give it back to you for free.

90751.「その 漆黒のノートと交換なら\n 風車のカギを 返してもいい。\n どうだい？:
I'll give you back the Windmill Key in
exchange for that Jet-Black Notebook. How's
that sound?

90752.盗賊ラゴスに 漆黒のノートを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you give the Jet-Black Notebook to the
thief Lagos?<yesno><close>

90753.「い いくら暴力をふるわれたって\n 僕は 屈しないからな！\n 風車のカギは:
I will not give in to violence, no matter how
much you assault me! The Windmill Key in
exchange for the Jet-Black Notebook!

90754.<cs_pchero>は 漆黒のノートを渡し\n風車のカギ（だいじなもの）を 手:
<cs_pchero> received
the Jet-Black Notebook and
the Windmill Key (Key Item)!<me_60>

90755.「ああ……懐かしいなあ。\n この手触り この紙の匂い。\n カンダタのヤツ ど:
Ahhh...I miss it so much. The feel of this,
the smell of this paper. Robbin' 'Ood, where
did you get this?

90756.「ん？ 君 まだいたのかい？\n 風車のカギを 渡したんだから\n さっさと キ:
Hmm? You're still here? I gave you the
Windmill Key, so get on your way to Glitter
Windmill Tower.

90757.「そのカギを キラキラ大風車塔 儀式の間の\n 壁にある ランプのひとつに使えば:
If you use that key on one of the lamps on the wall of the Glitter Windmill Tower, Ritual Hall, you should be able to get a Clanging
Battery.

90758.「それじゃ 僕はこれで！\n 僕が ここの暗闇に 隠れてることは\n くれぐれも:
Well, that's it for me! Please don't tell the
others that I'm hiding in the dark here!

90759.「おう！ そいつが ガンガン電池か。\n でかしたぜっ <pc>！:
Oh! That's the Clanging Battery. Way to go,
<pc>!

90760.「ペリポン！ この ガンガン電池で\n さっそく ビッグホルンを改造しろ！\n:
Peripon! I want you to use these Clanging
Batteries to retrofit Big Horn in five minutes
or less!

90761.「わあっ 待ってください！\n いくら無職で 時間があり余っているとはいえ\n:
Oh, wait! No matter how much time you have left because you're unemployed, you can't do it in less than 5 minutes. At least 15
minutes...

90763.「なんでえ もったいつけんじゃねえ！\n １０分以内なら 待ってやるぜ！！: I'll wait for you in 10 minutes!

90764.「いや……残念ながら\n １０分どころか 当分の間\n ビッグホルンの改造は ム:
No...unfortunately, it looks like we won't be
able to modify the Big Horn for the
foreseeable future, let alone for 10 minutes.

90766.「この ガンガン電池は キラキラ大風車塔の\n 回転を利用し 電力を貯めるのです:
This Clanging Battery uses the rotation of the
Glitter Windmill Tower to store power, but by
the looks of it, it's not fully charged yet.

90767.「無職の私には わかります……。\n まだ ガンガン電池は 本気を出していない。:
As an unemployed person, I can understand...
Clanging Battery hasn't gone full steam yet.

90768.「ちっ。こんなトコで 足止めかよ！\n 充電が終わるのは いつなんだ？:
Damn. We're stuck here! When are you going to
finish recharging?

90769.「はっきりとは わかりません。\n 何しろ 古い機械ですので\n すぐには 無理:
I don't know for sure. It's an old machine,
after all, so I can't say for sure...

90770.「ですが 幸運にも 私は無職です！\n 毎日…… いや １日に５回だって\n 様:
But fortunately for you, I am unemployed! I'll
check in on you every day... well, maybe five
times a day.

90771.「充電が終わったらすぐ\n カンダタ親分さんに ご連絡しましょう。\n どうか:
We will contact Robbin' 'Ood as soon as we
finish recharging. Please wait until then.

90772.「しょうがねえ 待っててやらあ。\n ちくしょう！\n ようやく 月に行けると思:
I'll just have to wait and see. Damn it! I
thought we were finally going to the moon...

90773.「それはそうと <pc>！\n よくぞ 盗賊ラゴスから \n 風車のカギを ブン:
By the way... How dare you boon the Windmill
Key from the thief Lagos!

90774.「さすがは 俺様の 最強の子分だぜ。\n これは 今回の礼だ。受け取りな！:
As expected of my most powerful henchman. This
is for you this time. Take it!

90775.「ガンガン電池の 充電が終わったら\n テメーにも 連絡してやる。:
I'll call you when the Clanging Battery is
fully charged.

91088.「あ どうも。はじめまして。\n あなたが カンダタ子分さんですか。\n 私 ペ:
Ah, hello. Nice to meet you. Are you Robbin'
'Ood's henchman? My name is Peripon.

91875.辺りには 誰もいないようだ……。: There doesn't seem to be anyone around...

91876.<cs_pchero>は カンダタにもらった\n漆黒のノートの文章を 読み上げた:
<cs_pchero> reads out a sentence from the
Jet-Black Notebook Robbin' 'Ood gave him!

91877.宿命……神と悪魔に引き裂かれし自我。\n盗みという快楽……背徳の美酒に魅せられし:
Fate...ego torn between God and Demon. The soul, enchanted by the pleasure of theft, the wine of immorality, manipulates the
commandment of the body night after night, driving it to sin.

91878.甘き罪……呼び醒まされる血が\n漆黒の闇に罪人を微笑ませ……宿業が刻まれる！！\:
Sweet Sinner...the blood that is awakened makes the sinner smile in the jet-black darkness... and the karma is engravd!
Tonight! Tonight!! Tonight...

97080.「それこそが 月の秘宝！！\n そいつを手に入れることが 俺様の夢だからだ！:
That's the Moon Treasure! Because it's my
dream to get it!

97081.「アイツは どうせ 暗闇に潜んでやがる。\n だが ノートの文章を 読み上げれば:
He's probably lurking in the dark. But if I
read the text in my notebook, Lagos will
surely appear.

97082.「そしたら 月の秘宝を 手に入れるため\n すぐに 月へと出発だ！\n 呼ばれた:
Then we'll go to the moon to get the Moon
Treasure right away! If you're called, come
flying to me! See you later!
